title: Target Lapsed Subscribers with a New Show
description: A new season of a very popular show is launching. An agent needs to target lapsed subscribers who previously watched that show with a 'come back' offer.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all lapsed subscribers who watched the previous season of the show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a target audience list.

tasks.description: Create an email campaign promoting the new season and including a special resubscribe offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts the email and the offer.

tasks.description: Schedule the email campaign to be sent to the target list on the day of the new season's premiere.
